channel.title: Making yourself admin
channel.description: Basically i have gone through tutorials on how to make yourself admin and its simple however i dont have a Login.Java File in my server and ive been looking through all my .java files trying to find somthing related to player rights anyone have any ideas? im using Rule-12 Source if that helps.

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

thanks for all the responses i just tried using notepad+ and it shows writing however it only shows Username= … then nothing else. rights = 0 donater = 0 and all other writing is no longer there…

Read full topic

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

please explain?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2009, 01:50:10 am[/size][hr]獵牥慮敭椺散y慰獳潷摲ㄺ㐰㤶㌰㔴㤸〳㤶爀杩瑨㩳0潤慮潴㩲0瑳牡整㩲0楦獲汴杯〺瀀捩畫⁰数㩮0慣❮⁴敬癡⁥数㩮0档瑡慎敭›畮汬琀扡㨰0慴ㅢ〺琀扡㨲0慴㍢〺琀扡㨴0慴㕢〺琀扡㨶0慴㝢〺琀扡㨸0慴㥢〺琀扡〱

Thats the type of writing in a character.dat file …

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Nuggetdabest, post:3, topic:317384”]317: Characters. Find the User. Open it up and look for: character-rights = 0 change it to…
character-rights = 1 Thats moderator.
character-rights = 2 Thats Administrator.
character-rights = 3 Thats Owner

508: bin/data/characters/maninsave/ Then open it up and if it’s All like: username: Password: etc. Change “Rights 0” to “Rights 2”. If it’s all encrypted(all in boxes or something) Then look for the first 0 then change it to 2. I hope i helped :)[/quote]

Not encrypted, it’s an ObjectOutputStream.

Read full topic

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

508 and its not as easy as changing rights its all wierd[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2009, 12:57:20 am[/size][hr]ok i found the character files but there all .dat files i opened them with notepad and changed the rights from 0 - 2 however the file doesnt seen to save the changes i make.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2009, 01:04:22 am[/size][hr]- Update the charcter.dat files now have chineese writing when i open them…

Read full topic

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @Nuggetdabest Nuggetdabest
item.description:
@Nuggetdabest wrote:

317: Characters. Find the User. Open it up and look for: character-rights = 0 change it to…
character-rights = 1 Thats moderator.
character-rights = 2 Thats Administrator.
character-rights = 3 Thats Owner

508: bin/data/characters/maninsave/ Then open it up and if it’s All like: username: Password: etc. Change “Rights 0” to “Rights 2”. If it’s all encrypted(all in boxes or something) Then look for the first 0 then change it to 2. I hope i helped

Read full topic
